description:
Steady Balance Feat 1
GeneralSkill
Source Core Rulebook pg. 267
Prerequisites trained in Acrobatics
You can keep your balance easily, even in adverse conditions. Whenever you roll a success using the Balance action, you get a critical success instead. Youâ€™re not flat-footed while attempting to Balance on narrow surfaces and uneven ground. Thanks to your incredible balance, you can attempt an Acrobatics check instead of a Reflex save to Grab an Edge.
